text: Francesco Samà (2 July 1940 – 10 February 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1992. Samà was also the Mayor of Melissa from 1964 until 1970. He was born in Melissa. Samà died in Crotone, Italy on 10 February 2022 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian communist politicians Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Calabria
title: Francesco Samà
